compliance_fields.description: A unique internal identifier for the customer relationship where the obligor's exposure is aggregated within the reporting entity's credit systems.
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Cannot contain a carriage return, line feed, comma, or any unprintable character.

compliance_fields.description: The reporting entity's unique internal identifier for the obligor, which identifies the entity under which multiple loans are aggregated.
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Cannot contain a carriage return, line feed, comma, or any unprintable character.

compliance_fields.description: The internal identification code assigned to the obligor in the previous submission. If there is no change from the prior submission or if this is the first submission, the Internal ID reported in Field 2 should be used as the Original Internal ID.
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Cannot contain a carriage return, line feed, comma, or any unprintable character.

compliance_fields.description: The obligor name on the credit facility. Full legal corporate name is desirable. If the borrowing entity is an individual(s) (Natural Person(s)), do not report the name; instead substitute with the text: 'Individual.' For fronting exposures, report the legal name of the participant lender.
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Cannot contain a carriage return, line feed, comma, or any unprintable character.

compliance_fields.description: The name of the city in which the obligor is domiciled (as defined in the FR Y-9C Glossary entry for 'domicile').
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Free text indicating the city where the Obligor is domiciled.

compliance_fields.description: The domicile of the obligor (as defined in the FR Y-9C Glossary entry for 'domicile').
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Use the 2 letter ISO Country Code.

compliance_fields.description: The five-digit zip code for locations within the 50 US states, Washington DC, Puerto Rico, the US Virgin Islands, Guam, Palau, Micronesia, the Northern Marianas, or the Marshall Islands. For other locations, refer to the foreign mailing code for the domicile of the obligor.
compliance_fields.allowable_values: For US locations, a five-digit ZIP code (including leading zeroes where necessary). For international locations, use the country-specific postal code.

compliance_fields.description: The numeric code that describes the primary business activity of the obligor according to NAICS (or SIC or GICS if NAICS is not available).
The type of industry code identification scheme used in Field 8 (NAICS, SIC, or GICS).
The obligor rating grade from the reporting entity's internal risk rating system (probability of default (PD) rating).
compliance_fields.allowable_values: Free text indicating the obligor rating grade which must be consistent with Schedule H.4 (Internal Risk Rating Schedule), Field 1.

compliance_fields.description: The Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) assigned to the obligor by the U.S. Internal Revenue Service (IRS). If the borrowing entity is an individual(s) (Natural Person(s)), do not report Social Security Number; instead enter 'NA'. If the borrowing entity does not have a TIN, enter 'NA'.
compliance_fields.allowable_values: A 9 digit identification assigned by the IRS (format: ##-#######, #########, or 'NA').

compliance_fields.description: The name of the stock exchange on which the primary stock of the obligor or its parent trades. If the borrowing entity is not publicly traded, enter 'NA'.
